title.en: Tsugi ni Attara Dakutte Kimeteta no de. Saikai Shita Hatsukoi no Kare ga Moujuuka Shitara...

altTitles.en: 下次見面就抱你。初戀對象再重逢已狼化…。
下次见面就抱你。初恋对象再重逢已狼化…。
次に会ったら抱くって決めてたので。 再会した初恋の彼が猛獣化したら…。

description.en:
From Batoto Scans:
"This is our first reunion in 10 years, what do you think you're doing kissing me outta nowhere?!"

Riko looked forward to seeing Baba-kun, who she secretly admired, at the high school alumni association. It's the first time she's seen him in 10 years and he's just as attractive as he was when they went to school together. They weren't really close, she just marveled at him from outside his shop, while she waited impatiently for him to talk to her.

"If you don't have anything interesting to talk about...", Riko said when Baba suddenly kissed her.
"Huh...what was that?...What😕"
"A kiss. You are cute, so I kissed you."
Whaat?! Was Baba-kun always this kind of person?!

In that moment her image of him completely changed, did he become a predator in those 10 years? How does a composed medical intern magically become like that because of a woman he likes?! 【Popular Boy】×【Quiet Girl】 Reunited and heart pounding ♪ A story about mutually unrequited love!
